name: spinelessness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
behaviour that shows a lack of determination and an unwillingness to take any risks: They fail to carry out their responsibilities out of sheer spinelessness. Not even her worst enemy could have accused her of spinelessness. See
spineless
More examplesFewer examplesThey will be outraged at his spinelessness for backing down to his boss. I have often reproached my fellow citizens for their spinelessness, self-indulgence, and greed. He berated the government for its spinelessness in failing to tackle the issue.
